title: Do You Know How to Change a Tire
itunes:title: Do You Know How to Change a Tire
description:
Today on the show we had media personality Melyssa Ford stop by who just joined the Iheart team. She spoke on her tragic car accident, working with her co host on Hollywood Unlocked and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" Bobby Brown's sister for making up that he got into a car accident and then we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our followers knew how to change a tire after DJ Envy shockingly admitted that he does not know how to during the show. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
